product_name: Showers Pass Storm Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: Because you'll want to take this high-visibility Showers Pass Storm bike jacket wherever you go, it comes with a mesh stuff sack for easy portability. Waterproof, breathable fabric and fully taped seams keep the wind and rain at bay. 2-way front zipper lets you ventilate as needed. Droptail hem ensures coverage in the riding position; elastic cuffs and hem keep warmth in and rain out. Large back vent encourages airflow so you won't overheat. Soft micro-chamois collar prevents zipper abrasion. Bright colors and 360deg of reflectivity help keep you visible in low light. Showers Pass Storm jacket comes with a matching mesh stuff stack.
short_description: Because you'll want to take this high-visibility Showers Pass Storm bike jacket wherever you go, it comes with a mesh stuff sack for easy portability.
